metadata.description: Provided language during training. Conditions on different language stimuli during training; images are the same. Uses the draw, describe, and free-generation testing behaviors.

descriptions: Skewers with a high line and low circle, three lines, a high circle and a low line, and nothing

Skewers with a circle, nothing, an eight, and three lines
